overview: Mumin, a precocious young boy, makes the long trip to Accra from his home in Ghanaâ€™s rural northern region. He leaves having just experienced his mothers death, her last words to him a directive to travel to Accra and find the father he has never met. Along the journey he experiences Ghana as only a child can and in so doing expands our view of what the country is and what it will be.
title: Native Sun
